metadata.title: Rokinon RK50M-MFT-SIL 50mm F1.2 AS UMC High Speed Lens for Olympus & Panasonic (Silver)
features: Lens features Rokinon Ultra Multi-Coated (UMC) optical glass for sharp, clear images
50mm fixed focal length with aperture range of f1.2-f21
Constructed of 9 lens elements in 7 lens groups
description: Designed for mirrorless cameras, this new Rokinon 50mm F1.2 High Speed Lens is available for Sony Alpha E mount, Fuji X mount, Micro Four Thirds and Canon M mount interchangeable lens cameras.  It features an extra fast F1.2 aperture and a superb optical construction with 2 internal aspherical lens elements.   The Rokinon 50mm Lens is also convenient and easy to use with a smooth focus ring, compact size and an included detachable lens hood.  Image results are bright, sharp & clear with high resolution & super low distortion.

title: Rokinon 50mm F1.2 Compact High Speed Lens
Rokinon 21mm F1.4 Compact High Speed Wide Angle Lens
Rokinon Cine DS Cinema Lenses
